issue.title: [C++] Remove arrow::Column class from C++ library
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5893](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5893). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Opening JIRA per ongoing discussion on mailing list.

This class unfortunately touches a lot of places, so I'm going to start by removing it from the C++ and Python libraries to assist with discussion about its fate.
